image_html: IMAGE
title_html: Deployment Models
subtitle_html: Phase 3 Test
content_html:
Public Cloud Foundation

Leverage massive scale and elasticity for unpredictable workloads.

Reduce capital expenditure; pay-as-you-go operational costs.

Accelerate deployment with pre-built services and global reach.

Delegate infrastructure management to the cloud provider.

Benefit from shared security models and continuous updates.

Ideal for non-sensitive data, development, and high-traffic apps.

Achieve rapid innovation with diverse, readily available services.

Private Cloud Control

Maintain full control over infrastructure, data, and security policies.

Meet stringent compliance and regulatory requirements effectively.

Optimize performance for critical, sensitive applications and data.

Utilize existing hardware investments and dedicated resources.

Ensure data residency and isolation within your own data center.

Requires internal IT expertise for management and maintenance.

Best for highly sensitive workloads requiring maximum governance.

Hybrid Cloud Agility

Combine public and private clouds for optimal workload placement.

Leverage public cloud for burst capacity; private for core data.

Ensure data mobility and interoperability across environments.

Balance cost efficiency with enhanced security and compliance.

Migrate workloads gradually, reducing risk and disruption.

Maintain control over critical data while scaling flexibly.

Maximize infrastructure flexibility for evolving business needs.
